scripts.help:
node -e "console.log('
Letta Event Manager - Commands:
');console.log('  npm run create-agent          Create Letta agent');console.log('  npm run send "message"        Send message to agent');console.log('  npm run file-watch <path>     Watch project for changes');console.log('  npm run test-fix <path>       Auto test-fix loop');console.log('  npm run dispatch-cli <file> <path>  Dispatch event');console.log('  npm run multi-agent <type> <file>   Multi-agent routing');console.log('  npm run rules-show            Show memory rules');console.log('
Examples:');console.log('  npm run file-watch ../my-project');console.log('  npm run test-fix C:/path/to/project');console.log('');"
